title: Properties of the HIFU transducer
description:
Properties and capabilities of an High Intensity Focused Ultrasound transducer.
Schema on github: https://github.com/Engineer2B/PowerCalculator-Schemas

ElementCoordinates.description: The coordinates of the transducer elements in [m].

ElementDirections.description: The directions of the transducer element planes.

Direction.description: Normalized direction towards which the transducer is focused.

ImmersionSurfaceId.description: The id of the surface in which the transducer is immersed.

NaturalFocus.description: Unshifted focus of the transducer in [m, m, m] (if ScaleFactor is 1).

Transformation.description: Transformation applied to the transducer positions and natural focus.

Inclination.description: X or Y axis rotation angle in radians.

Azimuth.description: Z axis rotation angle in radians.

Translation.description: Vector of translation in [m, m, m] (if ScaleFactor is 1).
